ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:31:00 urn:comixology:781663 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 22:44:38. [Issue ID 1969264]
ComicInfo.Summary: Gretel visits her old enemy Vita Mortuum, who claims to have reformed and become a nun, but it's a ploy to kill Gretel, who eventually sees through it and is saved by the mysterious Calabar, who appears in time to kill Vita. Elsewhere, Samuel is threatened by Tituba.
ComicInfo.Colorist: Ceci de la Cruz,Urszula Mos,Ceci de la Cruz
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Allan Otero,Garv (Keith Garvey),Hedwin Jimenez Zaldivar,Ivan Nunes,Jagdish Kumar,John Royle,Michael Dooney,Mike Krome,Mohan Sivakami,Netho Diaz,Sean Chen,Urszula Mos
